intro1:
Hello Dr. _______ ! 
Welcome to our town.
intro2:
It is brave of you to come to our town in this difficult time.
We appreciate your support.
intro3: I can give you the key to the location where you can meet and destroy the COVID Boss, once you are ready:
return2: I see you are here, perhaps thinking you are ready to defeat the greatest enemy you have ever faced...
isNotReady: Alas, you are not.  Keep training and return when you are ready!
isReady:
Your time has come, young warrior, you are now ready.
Take this key to enter the beast's lair.
And do be careful not to... lose, let us say.
